Metadata: From his studio overlooking Tongass Narrows in Ketchikan, Alaska, Ray Troll has made fish fun and evolution enchanting for fans worldwide. With scientific rigor, vivid draftsmanship and whimsical design, Troll captures the wonder and weirdness of the aquatic world, delighting children and biologists alike. He is a longtime friend of the UW who has collaborated with the Burke Museum and School of Aquatic and Fishery Sciences. WSG is honored to present this 17 x 23 inch color 2018 wall poster of Ray Troll's homage to our underwater neighbors ("Deep Forest", oil on canvas, 2009).
